name: Cecotec
0:
”Alexa, turn on Conga”
”Alexa, turn off Conga”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Now you can smartly clean your home with Conga using Alexa - it's so easy!

-You can say things like: - Alexa, turn on Conga. And Conga will start vacuuming. 
-You can also stop the Conga cleaning by saying: - Alexa, turn off Conga.
-You can also know where Conga is at all times by asking:-Alexa, set Conga to seek.
In addition, You can change Conga's mode by saying:
-Alexa, set Conga to strong.
-Alexa, set Conga to wall follow.
-Alexa, set Conga to spiral. etc.

After connecting Alexa to your products in a few simple steps:
1. Download our “Cecotec” app in app market then register an account (or log in directly if you already have an account);
2. Configure our devices in “Cecotec” app and change appropriate name for your devices;
3. Enable “Cecotec” skill on Alexa app, you'll be navigated to the login page, follow the instructions on the page to complete linking;
4. Tell Echo "Alexa, discover my devices". Wait for Echo to say “Search complete”.
5. Now all setup is finished. Enjoy the voice control on your home devices!
